00016 #ifndef SIMPLE_SKIPLIST_SLIST_H
00017 #define SIMPLE_SKIPLIST_SLIST_H
00018 
00019 #include <stdint.h>
00020 
00021 #ifdef __cplusplus
00022 extern "C" {
00023 #endif
00024 
00025 struct slist_node;
00026 
00027 /* 跳表分级索引 */
00028 struct slist_level {
00029     struct slist_node *next; /* 当前level的后继 */
00030     struct slist_node *prev; /* 当前level的前驱 */
00031 };
00032 
00033 /* 跳表中的结点 */
00034 struct slist_node {
00035     char *key;    /* 节点的键,内部分配 */
00036     uint32_t key_len;   /* 键值的长度 */
00037     uint32_t height;    /* 节点的最高索引级别 */
00038     void *value;        /* 节点的值,用户传入 */
00039     struct slist_level levels[1];   /* 多级索引柔性数组,至少1级 */
00040 };
00041 
00042 /* 跳表数据结构: 一个多级索引且有序的高效链表 */
00043 struct slist {
00044     uint32_t max_height;  /* 用户配置的最高索引层级,至少1级 */
00045     uint32_t cur_height;  /* 当前最高构建过的索引层级 */
00046     uint64_t num_nodes;   /* 总节点个数 */
00047     uint32_t seed; /* 生成随机数的种子 */
00048     struct slist_node *iterator; /* 正向迭代器 */
00049     struct slist_node *riterator; /* 反向迭代器 */
00050     struct slist_node *head;  /* 链表头节点,不含用户键值 */
00051     struct slist_node *tail;  /* 链表尾节点,key最大 */
00052     struct slist_node *level_node[1]; /* 用于计算索引的柔性数组 */
00053 };
00054 
00065 struct slist *slist_new(uint32_t height);
00076 void slist_free(struct slist *slist);
00090 int slist_insert(struct slist *slist, const char *key, uint32_t key_len, void *value);
00103 int slist_erase(struct slist *slist, const char *key, uint32_t key_len);
00117 int slist_find(struct slist *slist, const char *key, uint32_t key_len, void **value);
00131 int slist_front(struct slist *slist, const char **key, uint32_t *key_len, void **value);
00142 int slist_pop_front(struct slist *slist);
00156 int slist_back(struct slist *slist, const char **key, uint32_t *key_len, void **value);
00167 int slist_pop_back(struct slist *slist);
00178 uint64_t slist_size(struct slist *slist);
00189 void slist_begin_iterate(struct slist *slist);
00203 int slist_iterate(struct slist *slist, const char **key, uint32_t *key_len, void **value);
00214 void slist_end_iterate(struct slist *slist);
00225 void slist_begin_riterate(struct slist *slist);
00239 int slist_riterate(struct slist *slist, const char **key, uint32_t *key_len, void **value);
00250 void slist_end_riterate(struct slist *slist);
